ComicInfo.Title: Legacy of Spock, Part 3 of 4
ComicInfo.Summary: Legacy of Spock, Part 3 of 4: Elder Spock escapes from Romulan captivity with the assistance of the Romulan Resistance, and returns to the Vulcan fleet to warn them of the impending Romulan attack.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 11:54:32. [CVDB529504] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:14:01. [Issue ID 1570247]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ángel Hernández,J. K. Woodward,Tony Shasteen,Tony Shasteen
ComicInfo.Inker: Ángel Hernández,J. K. Woodward,Tony Shasteen,Tony Shasteen
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Ángel Hernández,J. K. Woodward,J.L. Del Rio,Tony Shasteen
ComicInfo.Characters: Rella [Vella] (female survivor of Nero's crew, Romulan),Captain Jean-Luc Picard (in flashback),T'Pah (Vulcan Elder),Lt. Commander Data (in flashback),Belia (Romulan Resistance member),Cyrano Jones,Arix (male survivor of Nero's crew, Romulan),Ador (Romulan Resistance member),Sarek,Romulan Praetor,Spock (older version from original timeline),Lucian (Romulan Senator),Vicia (Romulan Senator),Pardek (Romulan Senator)
